list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: adopt or be in a position in which one's weight is supported by one's buttocks rather than one's feet and one's back is upright.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I sat next to him at dinner
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi ngồi cạnh anh ấy vào bữa tối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be or remain in a particular position or state.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the fridge was sitting in a pool of water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tủ lạnh đang ngồi trong một vũng nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a legislature, committee, court of law, etc.) be engaged in its business.
stay in someone's house while they are away and look after their house or pet.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Kelly had been cat-sitting for me
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kelly đã được ngồi cho tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the way in which an item of clothing fits someone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngồi áo choàng của cô ấy
